website_summaries.verdict: With its agreeable price tag and well-rounded performance, this unit is undoubtedly the best bang for your buck.
pros: Produces food that's moist on the inside yet crispy on the outside
An ideal unit for cooking fish and meat
cons: A small number of units suffer from cracked domes over time

customer_reviews.title: Quality has declined
customer_reviews.text: The NuWave quality has seriously declined. The original unit from my order worked OK for about a month then the control buttons stopped working. I contacted NuWave warranty and they sent me another powerhead. That powerhead worked for a few weeks and quit working. I am currently contacting the company to get this unit replaced. I have been using NuWave products for years and was very satisfied with their products. Hopefully they will send me a unit that will be up to their former quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Love my NuWave !
customer_reviews.text: This is my second NuWave Oven Pro. I also own a NuWave PIC. I love both and use every single day, several times a day. My electric range and oven are rarely used. I cannot begin to express how easy the oven is to use and the clean up is so fast! I roast veggies, cook corn on the cob, cook mini pizzas, quesadillas, chicken breast, roasted whole chickens, fish, and so much more. Biggest thing for me, I hate dry chicken breast! Since cooking with the NuWave pro all of the chicken breast have been tender and juicy. I highly recommend. I have also purchased one as a gift and they love it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: J. KEMPF

customer_reviews.title: I've used it 6 times in two days!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to use, versatile. Can use foil and parchment paper to avoid clean up. In two days I've cooked sausage, hard boiled eggs, steak, sausage and chicken pot pie. No more waiting for the oven to pre-heat AND it won't be the end of the world if I forget to take meat outta the freezer before leaving for work. I haven't had to use the extender ring yet but it's great that I don't have to worry about getting a whole chicken that won't fit. Got rid of my toaster oven! This thing does it all and I can just set it and walk away! I hate cooking
customer_reviews.author: Nona's Momma

customer_reviews.title: You have to adjust the temperature by hand so you don't over cook the food
customer_reviews.text: I had three NuWave plus pro ovens for 6 years each three of them all three of them lasted six years I ordered one and it seems to get the food really really dark I have to turn it down 25 degrees I still use it all the time I can in it all the time but it's kind of inconvenience that I have to turn it down all the time because it over Cooks can be adjusted by the temperature but I really liked my other three letter they must have changed something thank you as much as I hate to say it I will be ordering another one because I do need three
customer_reviews.author: nanci

customer_reviews.title: Awsome machine to cook with
customer_reviews.text: The prep time and cook time is sooo much less and the end product of your meal is fantastic on taste. Clean up is a breeze. Do recommend that you place a glass, metal, or throw away tin on top of the bottom pan and cover that with aluminum foil to prevent damage or peeling of thin coated base pan( it is easier to gather the drippings and toss foil into trash). NuWave Oven Pro only need a "roisterer .
customer_reviews.author: FREDDIE J.

customer_reviews.title: Item works great but does not last
customer_reviews.text: Item works great but does not last, this is my second one that I've ordered from Amazon that has broken on me. To bad this item can't last pass a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sphong

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't for me
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this appliance. It was to big and ugly to leave on counter and to big to store in a cabinet. I used it twice and sold it in a garage sale for 1/3 of what I paid. It dries the food out. It was a bad buy for me. For some it might be just fine but just wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NuWave Oven
customer_reviews.text: I love this oven I'm on my 3rd one and I gave my sister one last month. I love that no matter what I cook in it weather it's frozen or thawed meat comes out juicy and tender. Anyone who's not crazy about cooking should have one of these. With this you need to know hoe to cook just follow directions and you'll have a great meal.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: A definite great addition
customer_reviews.text: I love the NuWave oven. It cooks meats and vegetables at the same time and the outside and inside temperatures and textures is perfect. Now they need to make a stove. Yes also the band is very good whim extra room is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Oven
customer_reviews.text: We love this oven. We just our third one which we gave to family. It cooks great, cleans easy an dis very convenient to use. Only issue we have is the control buttons on the top of the oven seem to wear out - especially the number 3. Wish list would include an oven light so we could see what is happening inside,
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kovarik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product cooks the best pork chops and chicken. Very juicy and tender. Huge hit with the kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and quick.
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. I was surprised just how quickly the NuWave oven prepared the meals that I've cooked. Cleaning up is a snap and the favor that I've experienced is better than I expected. If there is any downfall the NuWave oven could be made a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Crowbar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works so great!
customer_reviews.text: I use mine for reborning dolls but it works great for that purpose. It does not over heat the vinyl and so far I have had no negative reactions from the vinyl being heated in the Nuwave oven. Great big space and if you do decide to use it for food, it is easy to use and I am sure does a wonderful job on the food since it does a fantastic job at holding the heat to the exact degree in order to heat the vinyl for reborns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product!
customer_reviews.text: i cook turkey for dog food and this allows me to easily cook it frozen. works fine and although has 5 things to clean afterwards, it is still easy to do. my dog thanks you for the product otherwise it would be canned food!
customer_reviews.author: tmihi

customer_reviews.title: I can cook an entire 3 course meal in it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this NuWave oven to use in our Motorhome. It works great. It doesn’t heat up the RV as much as if I were using the burners on the stove. I prefer it over the convection oven/microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Nina B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this faulty piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for less than 3 months and the plastic dome is already cracking. It has almost completely split down one side. And it is supposedly the upgraded dome. I wish I had done further research before buying, as I only now just discovered that there is a class action lawsuit in regards to the faulty product being sent to consumers by Nuwave. They refuse to replace the dome, and charge an exorbitant amount to replace and ship. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My easy bake oven
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter. She loves steak we don't. Makes a great one. Have had one for 10 years. Great for even kids to fix something.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the nuwave! If I need something cooked quick thorough and tasty this is the way to go perfect for air frying, my husband said “if we ever have a restaurant we just need to buy a bunch of these and let it do the work” lol
customer_reviews.author: Dessie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Cooks everything in less time and tastes amazing!! This is my second one!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is our thrid nu-wave over many years. would not do without it

customer_reviews.title: Best value with the expansion ring
customer_reviews.text: Best value with the expansion ring, even worth sacrificing the 2 of everything deal, that doesn't include the ring. Very happy with performance.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it cooks good but I don't like having to turn the meat over at the halfway point!!! The demos make it look like you can put the food on and just walk away but its not the case!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pizza Reheating
customer_reviews.text: This thing works! It’s great! Reheating foods is the best thing it does!!!

customer_reviews.title: Turns itself off!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. Heats up in 3 minutes, turns itself off so nothing ever overcooks.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product! Pop in the cook time and bam
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Pop in the cook time and bam! Dinner in no time! Also, after you're done with it, clean up is a breeze. Throw everything but the top into the dishwasher and done.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: I bake a lot of custard pies, which are hard to get into the oven after filling. With this oven the crust goes on the rack and pour in the filling. no further move required.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Otto

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend and am happy to report that he uses it all the time and loves it. He’s cut down on fat consumption and cleaning time in his kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: This paid for itself in two weeks! Do it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! It does a great job cooking chicken and sides like sweet potato fries. 10min bacon at lunch with no mess or greasy stove. Living the dream... Bought this to avoid Uber Eats, saving money, eating healthier and having fun cooking.
customer_reviews.author: scott stone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great way to cook food fast and keep it juicy
customer_reviews.author: Herb Berry

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking utensil! Eliminating smelly broil and deep fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Reheats food like brand new. Makes frozen fried food taste fresh from the fryer. This is my second nuwave it’s awesome. I’ve even roasted a prime rib in it!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Sachs

customer_reviews.title: I love my Nuwave oven
customer_reviews.text: I love my Nuwave oven. It benefits my family of 4 kids to easily have snacks or meals done with less time. I cannot afford a stove as of now so I will use this until I get a stove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The food taste delicious and it’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Shipped quick.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He is surprised well and quickly this product cooks.
customer_reviews.author: HAROLD HOLLAND

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed...sure it's easy, does a good job on frozen pizzas or bake chickens, but at a max of 350 degrees doesn't brown well with beef. If you wait til a steak is brown it well done. Hamburgers are descent, not browned. Hot dogs and sausages are easy.
customer_reviews.author: mike cooper

customer_reviews.title: Compact, easy to clean use & manage
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I was a little skeptical because of the price but it was worth it

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I used it for bacon this morning. I use it almost every day.

customer_reviews.title: NuWave Oven Excitement
customer_reviews.text: I use this NuWave everyday for 50% - 100% of my daily cooking! Love it to peices!

customer_reviews.title: better than running a gas oven for 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: works as intended, better than running a gas oven for 3 hours.

customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed, thought it would be faster,definitely easy cleanup though

customer_reviews.title: This is a great investment. It saves a lot of cooking time

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Food sticks on grill even when it's sprayed---the cook book is not very usable- my grilled chicken breast have always been chewy--tried several times and have the say results--this is not near the results that you show on TV or the Web.

customer_reviews.title: I honestly have to say that we didn't really use ...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly have to say that we didn't really use this product at all. We had to send it back just cuz it was way too big!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and love being able to cook numerous ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost daily! Easy to clean and love being able to cook numerous things very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: NuWave is GREAT, Construction Materials Suck
customer_reviews.text: Although the NuWave is one of our most-used, and enjoyed of kitchen wares/appliances (we're on our third one now), still, it just cannot stand up to daily use before something on it breaks -most often the main (plastic) cover.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Love this counter top oven!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second NuWave oven, I used my first one daily for over 3 years before it gave up on me. I rarely use my regular oven, with the extender ring I can bake almost anything. My only negative comment is that the stainless steel extender ring seals to the top while in use (from steam) and has to be separated with a flat butter knife. The NuWave I had previously had a different extender ring and never had that problem. This has been my favorite kitchen appliance for several years, I recommend it to everyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!  WE BOUGHT THREE
customer_reviews.text: We love these ovens and now have three - 1 at home, one in the travel trailer, and one in the camper that sits on the pickup truck. Cooks great and dependably, easy to clean, and does not put a lot of heat into your house, thus saving you money on your AC bill. we never use the over anymore, and do our grilling indoors where it is comfortable in the heat of the summer. We have used these almost nightly since 2008, wherever we happen to be.
customer_reviews.author: nickn

customer_reviews.title: Best used in Barracks
customer_reviews.text: It's an Oven and it cooks like one. Took 24 minutes to cook a steak. Steak was doner in spots that other areas. Steak did not have the seared outer edge like you get from grill or skillet frying. It took longer to cook the steak with the NuWave Oven than if I had put it on a skilette. This product would be good in situations where you cannot have an open flame in the barracks, room or ...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnston

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice design. I had a couple of the original NuWaves with the hinged cover. That was the weak point of the old ones. This is much better. I like being about to take frozen chicken breast and frozen french fries, throw them in and 20 minutes later diner is ready.
customer_reviews.author: I like this company

customer_reviews.title: I find it's best for items like ribs and chicken pieces
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through two of the cooking panels, since they have both died on me. The first lasted about 5 months (thankfully, it was still under warranty) and the second replacement just died after using it only about a dozen times. Not sure if it's just my luck. However, while it worked, the cooking was okay. In my honest opinion, really nothing to rave about. I find it's best for items like ribs and chicken pieces. Does cook quicker than an oven. I attempted to cook a roast and the end result was extremely tough and dry. Not really useful for items that should be cooked with liquids. Pretty disappointed in this investment.
customer_reviews.author: pen229

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I actually have bought 4 of these. I own two for myself; one for my doll making and one for the Kitchen. We use it all the time. Our regular over hardly gets used now due to us always using the NuWave. My husband and I loved it so much that a couple of years ago we bought my mother-in-law one which loves it as well. This year we bought the 4th one for our son and his wife that will be one of their Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Racycarr

customer_reviews.title: It's a NuWave Oven!! What more could tyou ask for??
customer_reviews.text: It is a nuWave Oven, Might take a little getting used to with some foods, but once you get it down, it will cook almost anything in a fraction of the time that any other oven takes, and only heats up the area within the dome. Almost completely quiet while cooking as well.

customer_reviews.title: 👏
customer_reviews.text: I love it because it doesn’t heat up the kitchen like the oven, cooks evenly,and browns the food. I haven’t had it all that long. I’ve fixed pork roast,chicken wings and chicken breasts. 👍Takes up a lot of counter space. 😏

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product. It does cook frozen food quickly. It does very well with chicken and beef. The machine is easy to clean, Its dishwasher safe.

customer_reviews.title: Never cook in a hot kitchen again!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for myself and I love it so much, I got another to give as a gift. Never cook in a hot kitchen again! So convenient we even take it camping with us.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my mother and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: My mother cooks 90% of her meals in this NuWave Oven and loves it. She is always talking about the speed and ease of use. She recently cooked her Thanksgiving turkey in her NuWave with great results.

customer_reviews.title: Does Everything it Claims
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this healthy way to cook. Saves cooking power if you cook on electric or in electric oven. Really cooks frozen meat.Wore out my first NuWave.

customer_reviews.title: ... for years and this new one upgraded works just great I would recommend everyone on one it's quick and ...

customer_reviews.text: Make a roast, bake a cake, make pizza, or just toast, the baby does it all! This is my second one because our other just went dead (we use it a lot!)

customer_reviews.text: I use this item many times a week and I love it. I wish I had got one a long time ago. I also have a hot air fryer and between the two of them I don't have to use my oven.

customer_reviews.title: I love my NuWave Oven pro plus
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet. I bought it as a backup for one I have been using for 2 years. I love my NuWave Oven pro plus. I laid a stick of butter on top of it and forgot to move it. The heat from the timer melted the butter over time and it dripped into the vent on top. So on a cold day the oven is slow getting started. I purchase the new product to replace the one that I inadvertently "ruined", I haven't used it because the old one took the licking and has kept on ticking.

product_meta.title: NuWave Oven Pro Plus with Stainless Steel Extender Ring
product_meta.description:
Speed up cooking time with this versatile Oven Pro Plus from NuWave. Designed to produce succulent meats, poultry, fish, vegetables, and more, this domed oven uses conduction, convection, and infrared cooking technology to quickly and easily cook foods. This oven includes an upgraded amber PEI dome, black base and digital panel, reversible cooking rack, second cooking rack, porcelain enamel liner pan, and stainless steel extender ring. You can cook for up to 10 hours at a time to barbecue, roast, grill, bake, broil, dehydrate, steam and air fry various foods including a 16 pound turkey or 14 pound ham. With settings for warm, reheat, and delay, you can cook with pre-set temperatures or you can use the digital panel to adjust temperatures by one degree between 100 and 350 degrees Fahrenheit. This oven cooks with 75% less energy and 70% faster than standard ovens to provide quick and easy meals. Lightweight and portable, you can cook in RVs, dorms, boats or even as an extra oven for big gatherings. Backed by a manufacturers limited one year warranty, the parts are also dishwasher safe (except digital panel head).

Fully assembled without extender -- 15-3/4" x 15" W x 13" H; Fully assembled with extender -- 15-3/4" x 15" W x 16" H
feature_bullets: Includes upgraded amber PEI dome, black base and digital panel, 2 cooking racks, porcelain enamel liner pan, and stainless steel extender ring
Uses conduction, convection, and infrared cooking technology
Settings for warm, reheat, delay and up to 10 hours of cooking time
Digital temperature control from 100 to 350 degrees F in 1 degree increments
